thread.title: Yankton County voters reject tax increase for roads, bridges
thread.title_full: Yankton County voters reject tax increase for roads, bridges

title: Yankton County voters reject tax increase for roads, bridges
text:
Yankton County voters resoundingly reject $1.5M tax increase for road and bridge improvements 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 9/30/15 10:32   10:32 am EDT 
YANKTON, South Dakota â€” Voters in Yankton County have resoundingly defeated a proposed property tax increase to help fund road and bridge repairs. 
The Yankton Daily Press and Dakotan reports ( http://bit.ly/1jyrlY8 ) that preliminary results from Tuesday's election show 70 percent of the 3,427 voters opposed the measure. 
The levy would have hiked taxes on both non-agricultural property and farmland, raising an additional $1.5 million for improvements to roads and bridges. 
County commissioners in July adopted the levy but opponents referred it to a public vote through a petition drive 
Information from: Yankton Press and Dakotan, http://www.yankton.net/
